title: AI Code Review Assistant
shortDescription: Intelligent code review platform powered by AI, featuring real-time analysis, automated suggestions, and collaborative workflows for development teams
challenge: Building an AI-powered code review system that can analyze code quality, security vulnerabilities, and provide intelligent suggestions while handling real-time collaboration for distributed development teams.
solution: Developed a full-stack application using Next.js with AI integration through AWS services. Implemented real-time code analysis with Socket.io, created a comprehensive review dashboard with Radix UI components, and built an intelligent suggestion engine that learns from team coding patterns.
